abstract_summ: Data of China, Iran, Italy and the USA was also analyzed to assume how the death and case number increased.By evaluating different control strategies through predictive modeling and Monte carlo simulations, a comprehensive quarantine in hospitals and quarantine stations has been found to be the most effective approach.Objective: Objective of the study is to assume the number of positive case and death till 30th December, 2020 in Bangladesh.Analyzing the data increasing rate/common ratio of infection and death has been identified.The outbreak of the novel coronavirus disease, COVID-19, originating from Wuhan, China in early December, has infected more than 70,000 people in China and other countries and has caused more than 2,000 deaths.
title_summ: Assumption of possible infection and deathCharacterizing the transmission and identifying the control strategy for COVID-19 through epidemiological modelingTime Course of COVID-19 Cases in AustriaCOVID 19 in Bangladesh:
title_abstract_phrases: Characterizing the transmission and identifying the control strategy for COVID-19 through epidemiological modelingThe outbreak of the novel coronavirus disease, COVID-19, originating from Wuhan, China in early December, has infected more than 70,000 people in China and other countries and has caused more than 2,000 deaths.Data of China, Iran, Italy and the USA was also analyzed to assume how the death and case number increased.Time Course of COVID-19 Cases in AustriaCOVID-19 is an infectious disease caused by a novel coronavirus, which first appeared in China in late 2019, and reached pandemic distribution in early 2020.By evaluating different control strategies through predictive modeling and Monte carlo simulations, a comprehensive quarantine in hospitals and quarantine stations has been found to be the most effective approach.Objective: Objective of the study is to assume the number of positive case and death till 30th December, 2020 in Bangladesh.
